alert.note: Alert for Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 10:20AM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, Southern Clark County. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert and Cadiz Basin. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Crosswinds could result in over-turned high-profile vehicles on major thoroughfares. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous crosswinds possible along Interstate 15 between Barstow-Daggett and Primm as well as along Interstate 40 between Barstow-Daggett and Needles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
